detail_desc: Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims, short sleeves and a V-neck opening at the top with twisted ties. Unlined.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Fitted, knee-length dress in stretch cotton twill with buttons all the way down the front and a seam at the waist.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves, buttons down the front and two slits at the front hem.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves, buttons down the front and two slits at the front hem.
Short-sleeved top in a loose rib knit with a deep neckline and twisted detail at the back.
Short-sleeved top in a loose rib knit with a deep neckline and twisted detail at the back.
Short-sleeved top in a loose rib knit with a deep neckline and twisted detail at the back.
Bustier in a sturdy, fine-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a knot detail at the front.
Bustier in a sturdy, fine-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a knot detail at the front.
Short top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and embroidery on the front.
Short top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and embroidery on the front.
Cropped, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a drawstring down the front and short sleeves.
Cropped, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a drawstring down the front and short sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Low sweetheart neckline with an opening and decorative tie detail, and a seam under the bust.
Short-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Low sweetheart neckline with an opening and decorative tie detail, and a seam under the bust.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with lace details, a round neckline and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with lace details, a round neckline and long sleeves.
Sturdy clutch bag in imitation suede with a narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap and a flap with a round metal buckle and concealed press-stud. Lined. Size 6x15.5x27 cm.
Sturdy clutch bag in imitation suede with a narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap and a flap with a round metal buckle and concealed press-stud. Lined. Size 6x15.5x27 cm.
Tops and boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey. Tops with a racer back and elasticated hem. Briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Bucket bag in braided paper straw with a shoulder strap, drawstring at the top and zipped inner compartment. Lined. Diameter approx 17 cm, width 21 cm, height 22 cm.
Bucket bag in braided paper straw with a shoulder strap, drawstring at the top and zipped inner compartment. Lined. Diameter approx 17 cm, width 21 cm, height 22 cm.
Bucket bag in braided paper straw with a shoulder strap, drawstring at the top and zipped inner compartment. Lined. Diameter approx 17 cm, width 21 cm, height 22 cm.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups, removable inserts and an elasticated hem. Racer back with an opening and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Extra firm support.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey. One with a sewn-on bow at the front and one with a decorative knot detail.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey. One with a sewn-on bow at the front and one with a decorative knot detail.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey. One with a sewn-on bow at the front and one with a decorative knot detail.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey. One with a sewn-on bow at the front and one with a decorative knot detail.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey and lace with adjustable shoulder straps and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Waterproof, warm-lined hi-top boots in fabric with imitation leather and grosgrain details. Padded shaft with an imitation leather appliqué, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Pyjamas with a T-shirt and short shorts in soft jersey. T-shirt with a round, ribbed neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and overlocked hems.

Pyjamas with a T-shirt and short shorts in soft jersey. T-shirt with a round, ribbed neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and overlocked hems.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a knot detail at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a knot detail at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a knot detail at the hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif front and back.

Scarf in woven fabric with fringed edges. Size 70x170 cm.

Turban in a soft knit containing some wool.
Turban in a soft knit containing some wool.

Longer blouse in a woven blend containing some linen with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short dressing gown in cool satin with lace sections. Wrapover front with concealed ties at one side, a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length, scallop-trimmed sleeves.
